It represents the codebase as a directed graph where nodes are unique namespaces (functions, methods, or classes) and edges represent the \"calls\" relationship.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de71e47b-8b20-45be-9657-eddbe9e38537","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This module provides the final architectural view of how data and execution flow through the system, enabling features like security impact analysis, dependency visualization, and reachability tracking.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c79a8957-cfe3-4573-bfcb-53b4be8a6f6f","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"c437821d-fef7-4537-a560-eb44f4c0526b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Purpose and primary goal of this module is to transform granular, line-by-line analysis data into a high-level architectural model:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ffc6792d-f390-43de-93b5-549871eb1f14","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Relationship Mapping","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It records every instance where one functional entity invokes another.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a981de48-5d33-4385-ac3e-b490fb8f3a84","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Artifact Normalization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It performs sophisticated string processing to strip away internal analysis markers (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"while","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" placeholders), ensuring the graph represents actual source code logic rather than engine internals.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9a484980-6a89-4fd7-842d-b67a403f71fa","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Module Context","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It tracks which code file (module) owns each node, allowing for file-to-file dependency analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b148cb7-a266-4687-a502-7ed1ff680976","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Signal Filtering","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It automatically excludes \"noise\" such as primitive types (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<str>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and
